en-US.alert_about: LimitKit provides event logging and rate limiting for shortcuts.

en-US.prompt_command: Choose command to send for the event:
en-US.prompt_delete_confirm: Delete all LimitKit entries? This operation cannot be undone.

This operation cannot be undone.
